headline: Garrett Motion (GTX) Valuation In Focus After JPMorgan Overweight Call And Zero Emission Expansion
summary: Recent analyst coverage of Garrett Motion (GTX), including a new Overweight initiation from JPMorgan, has refocused attention on the stock as investors weigh the internal combustion engine business alongside the growing zero emission vehicle push. See our latest analysis for Garrett Motion. At a share price of $18.48, Garrett Motion has seen a 10.13% 1 month share price return and a 44.94% 3 month share price return.
